html: Machine Learning Intern at Optical Network and Technologies Lab(SEECS) : Performed data labeling, data preprocessing, data annotation, model training, and performance evaluation.

Android Developer Intern at RADWI, National Science & Technology Park : Gained proficiency in Kotlin, building a responsive Android app from scratch in Android Studio, integrating APIs, and optimizing performance.Implemented machine learning models within the app.

Machine Learning Intern at Optical Network and Technologies Lab(SEECS) : Worked on my final year project by creating and processing custom image datasets, including pipelining, labeling, and cleaning for efficient data handling. Designed and deployed computer vision algorithms and deep learning models (CNNs) for object detection. Also designed computer vision algorithms for video enhancement.
